snippet: Fresh from two performances at the Met, the mezzo-soprano Jamie Barton inaugurated the Voce at Pace recital series at the Michael Schimmel Center for the Arts.
abstract: Zachary Woolfe reviews Voce at Pace recital series performance by mezzo-soprano Jamie Barton at Michael Schimmel Center for the Arts.
lead_paragraph: Fresh from two performances at the Met, the mezzo-soprano Jamie Barton inaugurated the Voce at Pace recital series at the Michael Schimmel Center for the Arts.

headline.seo: Jamie Barton Opens Voce at Pace Series
headline.main: Brahms to Ives to Knotty Swedish Consonants, a Mezzo Goes the Full Range
headline.print_headline: Brahms to Ives to Knotty Swedish Consonants, a Mezzo Goes the Full Range
